item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，Stellantis公司将因软件故障召回72,502辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周一援引一份提交给该监管机构的新闻稿称，克莱斯勒母公司斯特兰蒂斯公司（Stellantis）正在美国召回72509辆公羊汽车，原因是仪表板显示屏存在软件故障，导致显示屏出现空白。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis is recalling 72,509 Ram vehicles in the U.S. due to a software glitch in the instrument panel display that is causing it to go blank, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said, citing a release submitted to the regulator on Monday.】

item.title: 英国对未通过年龄检查的色情网站罚款 130 万美元
item.description: 英国周四对一家色情网站公司处以 100 万英镑（133 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司没有进行严格的年龄检查以保护儿童，这是迄今为止英国在新的网络安全制度下处以的最大一笔罚款。【原文：Britain fined a porn website company 1 million pounds ($1.33 million) on Thursday for not having robust age checks in place to protect children, the biggest penalty to be imposed so far under its new online safety regime.】

item.title: 日本央行赢得了与高市的首次对决--接下来会发生什么就不那么确定了
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫利用外交手段，向首相佐那江隆一推销他的 12 月加息计划，并强调了通胀和日元疲软的危险，而佐那江隆一去年还称加息是愚蠢之举。【原文：Bank of Japan chief Kazuo Ueda used diplomacy and nodded to the dangers of inflation and a weak yen to sell his plan for a December rate hike to Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi, who only last year called rate hikes stupid.】

item.title: 消息人士称埃克森公司将从 3 月起永久关闭新加坡的一座蒸汽裂解装置
item.description: 四位知情人士透露，埃克森美孚计划从 3 月起关闭位于新加坡裕廊岛的两座蒸汽裂解装置中较早的一座的运营，这是全球石化行业在行业亏损的情况下削减产能趋势的一部分。【原文：ExxonMobil plans to wind down operations at the older of its two steam crackers on Singapore's Jurong Island from March, four sources familiar with the matter said, part of a global petrochemicals sector trend to reduce capacity amid industry losses.】

item.title: 奥尤陶勒盖扩产，力拓上调 2025 年铜产量预期
item.description: 力拓（Rio Tinto）周四上调了其 2025 年铜产量预期，理由是其位于蒙古的奥尤陶勒盖（Oyu Tolgoi）项目正在加速运营。【原文：Rio Tinto , upgraded its 2025 copper production forecast on Thursday, citing a ramp-up of operations at its Oyu Tolgoi project in Mongolia.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行可能在 12 月加息，政府将容忍此举
item.description: 三位熟悉审议情况的政府消息人士称，日本央行很可能在 12 月加息，预计政府将容忍这一决定。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to raise interest rates in December with the government expected to tolerate such a decision, three government sources familiar with the deliberations said.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元贬值交易休息日
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 宜家在新西兰开设距离瑞典最远的分店
item.description: 宜家家居周四在新西兰开设了第一家分店，这是它进入的第 64 个市场，也是这家家具零售商离开瑞典本土最远的前哨站。【原文：IKEA opened its first store in New Zealand on Thursday, entering its 64th market and marking the furniture retailer's most distant outpost from its native Sweden.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟将就 WhatsApp 使用人工智能一事对 Meta 发起反垄断调查
item.description: 据《金融时报》周四报道，布鲁塞尔正计划就 WhatsApp 推出人工智能功能一事对 Meta Platforms 展开新的反垄断调查。【原文：Brussels is planning a new antitrust investigation into Meta Platforms over the rollout of artificial intelligence features within WhatsApp, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: PitchBook 发现，美国私募股权退出交易将迎来复苏的第二年
item.description: 数据提供商 PitchBook 在周四的一份报告中称，美国私募股权公司今年的投资套现额有望超过 2024 年，交易复苏令人欣喜，但交易还需要进一步加强，以帮助清理账面上不断增加的旧资产。【原文：Private equity firms in the United States are on track to cash out more of their investments this year than in 2024 in a welcome recovery for dealmaking, but transactions will need further bolstering to help clear the increasing build-up of older assets on their books, data provider PitchBook said in a report on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚称全球将效仿社交媒体禁令，Meta 开始屏蔽青少年
item.description: 澳大利亚互联网监管机构称，随着 Meta 的 Instagram、Facebook 和 Threads 在下周截止日期前开始锁定数十万个账户，青少年社交媒体禁令将成为全球推动控制大型科技公司的第一块多米诺骨牌。【原文：Australia's internet regulator said a teen social media ban would be the first domino to fall in a global push to rein in Big Tech, as Meta's Instagram, Facebook and Threads began locking out hundreds of thousands of accounts ahead of a deadline next week.】

item.title: 海康威视质疑美国扩大打击中国电信设备的决定
item.description: 中国制造商海康威视（Hikvision）周三表示，其美国分公司已对美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commision）的一项新规定提出法律挑战，该规定允许华盛顿收紧对被认为存在安全风险的中国公司生产的电信设备的规定。【原文：Chinese manufacturer Hikvision said on Wednesday its U.S. arm has filed a legal challenge to a new Federal Communications Commision rule that allows Washington to tighten rules on telecoms gear made by Chinese companies deemed security risks.】

item.title: 美元疲软，降息热情不减，欧元创 7 周新高
item.description: 在低迷的经济数据巩固了美联储下周降息的理由之后，美元周四走软，为日元提供了支撑，并将欧元推升至近七周来的最高水平。【原文：The U.S. dollar was soft on Thursday after lacklustre economic data cemented the case for a rate cut from the Federal Reserve next week, providing relief to the yen and pushing the euro to its highest level in nearly seven weeks.】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击俄罗斯石油基础设施，和谈陷入僵局，油价坚挺
item.description: 乌克兰对俄罗斯石油基础设施的袭击预示着潜在的供应限制，而停滞不前的和平谈判也削弱了对达成协议恢复俄罗斯石油流向全球市场的预期，尽管疲软的基本面因素限制了油价的涨幅，但周四油价仍小幅走高。【原文：Oil prices moved slightly higher on Thursday after Ukrainian attacks on Russia's oil infrastructure signalled potential supply constraints, and stalled peace talks tempered expectations of a deal restoring Russian oil flows to global markets, though weak fundamentals kept gains limited.】

item.title: 第二位澳新银行代理顾问建议投票反对薪酬报告
item.description: 澳大利亚贷款机构澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）颇具影响力的代理顾问机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）周四建议投资者对该银行的高管薪酬报告投反对票，成为本周第二个这样做的顾问集团。【原文：Australian lender ANZ Group's influential proxy advisor Institutional Shareholder Services on Thursday recommended investors vote against the bank's executive pay report - making it the second advisor group to do so this week.】

item.title: 美联储加息在即，亚洲市场涨跌不一，情绪不温不火
item.description: 美元创下五周新低，亚洲股市周四开盘表现低迷，此前疲弱于预期的经济数据巩固了美联储将在下周会议上降息的预期。【原文：The dollar hit a five-week low while Asian stocks made a lacklustre start to the trading session on Thursday, after weaker-than-expected economic data cemented expectations the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at its meeting next week.】

item.title: OpenAI 同意收购人工智能初创公司 Neptune 以增强模型训练能力
item.description: 聊天金沙国际娱乐网址（ChatGPT）制造商 OpenAI 周三表示，已同意收购一家提供工具帮助企业跟踪人工智能模型训练的初创公司 Neptune。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to acquire Neptune, a startup that provides tools that help companies track their AI model training, the ChatGPT maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新汽车数据显示，特斯拉 11 月英国汽车销量下降
item.description: 研究机构 New AutoMotive 周四发布的初步数据显示，特斯拉 11 月份在英国的汽车注册量下降了 19%。【原文：Tesla's UK car registrations fell by 19% in November, preliminary data from research group New AutoMotive showed on Thursday, following steep drops reported in other European markets for the month.】

item.title: 新汽车数据显示，特斯拉 11 月英国销量下降 19
item.description: 研究机构 New AutoMotive 周四的初步数据显示，特斯拉 11 月份在英国的汽车销量同比下降了 19%，这家美国电动汽车制造商在欧洲的市场份额继续被中国竞争对手甩开。【原文：Tesla's UK car sales fell 19% year-on-year in November, preliminary data from research group New AutoMotive showed on Thursday, as the U.S. electric vehicle maker continues to lose ground in Europe to its Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 维基百科联合创始人威尔士：维基百科寻求更多与谷歌合作类似的人工智能许可交易
item.description: 维基百科的联合创始人吉米-威尔士（Jimmy Wales）周三表示，维基百科正在与大科技公司合作，达成类似于与谷歌的协议，以帮助该公司利用人工智能公司对其内容的高度依赖实现货币化。【原文：Wikipedia is working with Big Tech on deals similar to its arrangement with Google, the online encyclopedia's co-founder, Jimmy Wales, said on Wednesday, in a bid to help the firm monetize AI companies' heavy reliance on its content.】

item.title: 网站显示，Optus 恢复了布里斯班和昆士兰部分地区的 nbn 服务
item.description: 澳大利亚电信公司 Optus 周四在其网站上发布的最新消息称，在布里斯班和昆士兰其他受影响地区的国家宽带网络（nbn）服务最近发生故障后，该公司已完全恢复了服务。【原文：Australian telecom company Optus has fully restored its National Broadband Network (nbn) services in Brisbane and other affected areas of Queensland following a recent outage, according to an update on its website on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，派拉蒙将华纳兄弟竞购的分手费提高到 50 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引熟悉派拉蒙天舞收购华纳兄弟发现公司的人士的话报道，派拉蒙天舞已将收购华纳兄弟发现公司的分手费提高到 50 亿美元。【原文：Paramount Skydance has raised the proposed breakup fee in its bid to acquire Warner Bros Discovery to $5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the offer.】

item.title: 雪佛龙明年斥资高达 190 亿美元，重点关注美国和圭亚那的石油生产
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周三表示，2026 年的资本支出将在 180 亿至 190 亿美元之间，因为这家石油巨头将重点放在美国的生产以及与最近在圭亚那收购的石油股份相关的投资上。【原文：Chevron said on Wednesday that capital expenditure for 2026 will be between $18 billion and $19 billion as the oil major focuses on production in the U.S. and investments connected to a recently-acquired oil stake in Guyana.】

item.title: 大型做市商 Virtu 因客户交易数据问题被美国证券交易委员会罚款 250 万美元
item.description: 维塔士金融公司（Virtu Financial）将支付 250 万美元的罚款，以了结美国证券交易委员会对该大型做市商的指控，即允许其经纪商部门的几乎所有员工不当获取有关客户及其交易的机密信息。【原文：Virtu Financial will pay a $2.5 million fine to settle U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission accusations the large market maker improperly allowed almost all employees at its broker-dealer unit access to confidential information about customers and their trades.】

item.title: 交易日 美联储希望火灾风险反弹
item.description: 周三，在出人意料地疲软的私营部门就业数据增加了美联储下周再次降息的可能性之后，股市上涨，美债收益率和美元下跌。【原文：Stocks rose while U.S. bond yields and the dollar fell on Wednesday, after surprisingly weak private sector jobs data increased the likelihood that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates again next week.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利投资银行联席主管阿索穆尔预计将有更多金融并购活动
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资银行联席主管莫-阿索穆尔（Mo Assomull）在周三举行的路透社 Next 讨论会上表示，摩根士丹利认为明年各行各业的交易量都很大，包括并购和首次公开募股交易。【原文：Morgan Stanley is seeing a strong deals pipeline across sectors for next year, including M&A and IPO transactions, the bank's co-head of investment banking, Mo Assomull, said at a Reuters Next panel on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英特尔表示将保留网络与通信部门
item.description: 英特尔公司周三表示，在对网络和通信部门的战略选择进行审查后，该公司决定保留该部门。【原文：Intel said on Wednesday it has opted to keep its networking and communications unit in the company following a review of strategic options for the unit.】

item.title: 雪花公司第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: 受益于数据分析服务的强劲需求，Snowflake 周三公布的第三季度营收高于分析师预期。【原文：Snowflake posted third-quarter revenue above analysts estimates on Wednesday, benefiting from strong demand for its data analytics services.】

item.title: Salesforce 上调年度收入预期
item.description: Salesforce 周三上调了 2026 财年的收入预期，预计由于企业需求强劲，其人工智能代理平台将实现增长，这使其股价在延时交易中上涨了约 4%。【原文：Salesforce raised its fiscal 2026 revenue forecast on Wednesday, anticipating growth from its artificial intelligence agent platform due to strong enterprise demand, sending its shares up around 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 巴西法官命令政府将 JBS 子公司列入奴役 "肮脏名单
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份法院裁决，巴西一名联邦劳工法官命令政府将肉类包装商 JBS 旗下的一个家禽部门列入所谓的 "肮脏名单"，该名单上的雇主应对使工人遭受类似奴役的条件负责。【原文：A federal labor judge in Brazil ordered the government to add a poultry unit of meatpacker JBS to a so-called "dirty list" of employers responsible for subjecting workers to slavery-like conditions, according to a Tuesday court ruling seen by Reuters.】
